title: A VERY fed Riven just gave you this look
body:
http://67.media.tumblr.com/dc3c90043183c7e41d8e9e4a1b00bc8c/tumblr_mxdn8fHJKw1shmq50o1_r1_500.gif

I'd ask what happens next but let's face it we all know

http://img03.deviantart.net/ab86/i/2016/011/7/0/you_feel_like_you_re_going_to_have_a_bad_time__by_nightsjester-d9nn9d6.png

replies.body: I'll show her the way to the washing machine. She is gooped all over with phosphorescent liquids and that can't be good.

Hmmm... Riven covered in green goo... Wonder where that came from?

{{champion:154}}

We need someone who can match her strength. With the highest pinches of salt. 

Yasuo.

http://img09.deviantart.net/358c/i/2014/216/e/5/samurai_let_me_teach_you_by_black__moth-d7tqitm.jpg
And they loved happily ever after. 

;^)

{{champion:2}} : I'LL EAT YOUR CC BISH


HGUHGRUGHFUHGURHGHRUGHUH




http://cdn.yourepeat.com/media/gif/003/486/351/a32a944857f5e9af05dc489c6ce7844f.gif
But what if that Fed Riven is on your own team, hm? :p
Still going to have a bad time.  A fed salty allied Riven is the worst kind of Riven.

Riven player stereotypes are the best stereotypes.

C'mon though, you have to admit that any fed ally giving you that look means that a new dead sea is about to be created from their salt and your tears.  It being Riven just increases the salt to water ratio a bit.

Me: Your on your own turret!

Turret: Noooo, come back. ;__;
I play Karthus, I have no fear of a fed Riven, let her come, even if I fall, I will make her join my choir. {{champion:30}}

why is there a green liquid on the flor, is it green blood? the blood of zac?
did riven kill zac? killed her ship partner to go with someone else?
sounds like an interesting theory.
Hint: RaptorKarr doesn't approve of the Zac Riven ship (afaik)
where the fuck are u bro, didn't see you since 15 years

Yeah, I punch her in the face and kill her instantly. {{champion:254}} 

Your cc doesn't scare me bitch.
Am I still going to have a bad time if I'm the fed enemy pantheon with 0 deaths? lol
